name: Kasha With Mushrooms
keywords: buckwheat groats, kasha, mushroom, dairy-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 cup whole or coarse grain buckwheat groats (kasha)
1 1/2 cups well-seasoned beef or chicken stock
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the groats with the egg white in a heavy quart-and-a-half saucepan. Place over medium heat and stir with a fork for two to three minutes, until the grains are separated.
Add the mushrooms and stock. Bring to a simmer, add the thyme, cover and cook over very low heat for 10 to 15 minutes, until the liquid has been absorbed.
Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve.
